properties.name: multiselection
properties.description: Form element for selection multiple values out of a list of possible values.
properties.parameters: [["Type","Value","list","Note how the selection should be presented. Possible values are 'list' and 'checkbox'. "],["Options","List","Mandatory!","List of selectable values."]]
properties.examples:
Category = multiselection (Comedy, Drama, Mystery, Science Fiction, Family)

Category = multiselection checkbox (Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday)
properties.storage: The selected values are stored as a comma separated string, e.g. "Mystery,Science Fiction".
